    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    Carte
    The type Carte that represent a card.
    CarteExtension
    The type Carte extension that represents new cards.
    CompteurStandard
    The type Compteur standard responsible for counting player's score.
    ControleurDemarrer
    The type Controleur demarrer.
    Couleur
    The enum Couleur that represent every colors available for cards.
    InputNotDefined
     
    Joueur
    The type Joueur that represent any player.
    JoueurPhysique
    The type Joueur physique which represent the player behind the computer.
    JoueurVirtuel
    The type Joueur virtuel that represent a bot.
    MenuPrincipale
    The enum Menu principale that represent every option in the menu.
    MonInterface
    The type Mon interface that represent the window.
    Niveau
    The enum Niveau that represent every strategy available for bots.
    OptionPartie
    The enum Option partie that represent the options available between every turns.
    Paquet
    The type Paquet that represent a card array.
    Partie
    The type Partie that represent the game.
    Pioche
    The type Pioche that represent the main cards pack.
    Regle
    The interface Regle that represent a rule.
    RegleDispo
    The enum Regle dispo that represent every rules available.
    RegleSpecial01
    The type Regle special 01 that represent the first rules wariation.
    RegleSpecial02
    The type Regle special 02 that represent the second rules variation.
    RegleStandard
    The type Regle standard that represent standard rules.
    Strategie
    The interface Strategie that represent any strategy.
    StrategieAvancee
    The type Strategie avancee that represent the second strategy available for bots.
    StrategieSimple
    The type Strategie simple that represent the most basic strategy.
    TrophyValue
     
    Valeur
    The enum Valeur that represent the available values for cards.
    VisitorScore
